languages.text: "Ты мучаешь свою же семью, чтобы "спасти"? Ослепляешь, чтобы узрели истину?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты издеваешься над своей же семьей, чтобы спасти их? Ослепляешь, чтобы узрели истину? Это странно".

languages.text: "You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"
languages.original_text: "Ты мучаешь свою же семью, чтобы "спасти"? Ослепляешь, чтобы узрели истину?"

traits.locale_text: "You've been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You've been blinding them so they can see the truth?"
"You've been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You've been blinding them so they can see the truth?"
"You've been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You've been blinding them so they could see the truth?"
"You've been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You've been blinding them so they could see the truth?"
"You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"
"You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"

languages.text: "Ihr habt Eure eigene Familie gefoltert, um sie zu 'retten'? Ihr habt sie geblendet, damit sie die Wahrheit sehen können?"
languages.original_text: "You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Eure eigene Familie gefoltert, um sie zu 'retten'?" Ihr habt sie geblendet, damit sie die Wahrheit sehen können?"

languages.text: « Vous torturez les membres de votre propre famille pour les "sauver" ? Vous les aveuglez pour qu'ils puissent voir la vérité ? »
languages.original_text: "You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous torturez les membres de votre propre famille pour les "sauver" ? Vous les aveuglez pour qu'ils puissent voir la vérité ? »

languages.text: “你‘拯救’家人的方式就是折磨他们吗？你为了让他们看到真相，所以要把他们弄瞎吗？”
languages.original_text: "You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"

traits.locale_text: “你‘拯救’家人的方式就是折磨他们吗？你为了让他们看到真相，所以要把他们弄瞎吗？”

languages.text: 「彼らを『救う』ために自分の家族を拷問しているだと？彼らが真実を見れるために目を潰しただと？」
languages.original_text: "You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らを『救う』ために自分の家族を拷問しているだと？彼らが真実を見れるために目を潰しただと？」

languages.text: «¿Ha estado torturando a su propia familia para "salvarla"? ¿Les ha estado cegando para que pudieran ver la verdad?».
languages.original_text: "You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha estado torturando a su propia familia para "salvarla"? ¿Les ha estado cegando para que pudieran ver la verdad?».

languages.text: "Aileni 'kurtarma' uğruna onlara işkence mi ediyorsun? Gerçeği görsünler diye gözlerini kör mü ediyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You have been torturing your own family in order to 'save' them? You have been blinding them so that they could see the truth?"

traits.locale_text: "Aileni 'kurtarma' uğruna onlara işkence mi ediyorsun? Gerçeği görsünler diye gözlerini kör mü ediyorsun?"
